rooms.description: North-facing entrance with a foyer integrating modern Bohemian elements and a Vastu-optimized layout. The entrance is designed to invite positive energy.
Spacious living area with Bohemian decor featuring eclectic furniture and vibrant art pieces. Includes seating areas and a central coffee table.
Dedicated home theater with acoustically optimized design, incorporating ambient lighting and comfortable seating for a multimedia experience.
Modern kitchenette designed to suit a bachelor pad lifestyle, with energy-efficient appliances and ample storage space. Vastu principles ensure proper alignment for cooking activities.
Bohemian-themed bedroom featuring a spacious balcony attached to the room, ensuring natural light and fresh air. Adheres to Vastu guidelines by orienting the bed in a favourable direction.

openings.description: A large, inviting entrance door with natural light. The North-facing entrance is optimized to welcome positive energy and aligns with Vastu principles.
